# What is 01analysis.Rmd?

## Solutions
1. Create package: The analysis are functions; Hard
1. [ProjectTemplate](http://projecttemplate.net/index.html): Load automatically; R specific, configs
1. [cookiecutter data science](https://drivendata.github.io/cookiecutter-data-science/) + makefile: Most general; python...

# "It Workes on My PC !"

## Solutions
1. [packrat package](https://rstudio.github.io/packrat/): R Studio GUI! 
1. [Docker](https://github.com/rocker-org/rocker/wiki/Using-the-RStudio-image): Relatively technical

# Don't Want to Use git

## Solutions
1. Create duplicates: DRY 
1. Easy git by [ropenscilabs/changes](https://github.com/ropenscilabs/changes)
